Articles.Content:
In a bit of randomness, KSP decided that Minmus's Highlands biome would have 0% ore, and the [basic orbital scan](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/M700_Survey_Scanner) more-or-less told me that. Going down to the surface and performing a [surface scan](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Surface_Scanning_Module), however, changed the display from "Ore[surf]: (0% avg.)" to "Ore[surf]: (Unknown avg.)".

This "Unknown avg." continues to display even with the [narrow scanner](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/M4435_Narrow-Band_Scanner).

> ![CFC6EB56F3C4E0AFF9DBC8A03E3F86FBE57DC364](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/450706552923931548/CFC6EB56F3C4E0AFF9DBC8A03E3F86FBE57DC364/)

Save started in KSP 1.0.2, the update to 1.0.4 (via Steam) doesn't seem to have affected anything.
